title: 5 Renewable Energy Companies To Support In 2023 - EARTH.ORG
summary: Renewable energy companies are playing a significant role in the global transition away from fossil fuels. Some of the top companies to watch in 2023 include Canadian Solar, Brookfield Renewable Partners, Vestas Wind Systems, Clearway Energy, and SolarEdge Technologies. These companies offer promising investment opportunities and are committed to making alternative energy sources more widely available.

title: Op-ed: Keep an eye on medical technology and alternative energy sectors - CNBC
summary: Medical technology and alternative energy are expected to flourish in 2023 due to pent-up demand and government support, respectively. Conversely, consumer staples may struggle as their valuations have become too expensive. Investors looking for growth should reconsider their defensive holdings in this sector.

title: 'Raw Deal' takes a hard look at the state of the American meat industry - NPR
summary: The meatpacking industry in the United States is dominated by a handful of powerful companies that rely on industrial-scale farms and control large shares of the market. The industry is responsible for a number of environmental problems, including water and air pollution, and also contributes to climate change. There are a number of promising new meat substitutes that are gaining traction in the market, but they still only represent a small fraction of the total meat industry.

title: Protectionism, Pandemic, War, and the Future of Trade - BCG
summary: The global trade environment is becoming less friendly due to rising trade tensions and economic nationalism. Companies are diversifying their trading relationships to reduce risks. The evolving trade map shows relationships coalescing around a new East versus West dynamic.
